# 萌兔对对碰

## 更新命令

> [!TIP] 萌兔对对碰 - 测试 - SERVER
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/demo/rsync_go_game_mtddp_admin.sh
> ```

> [!TIP] 萌兔对对碰 - 测试 - WEB
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/demo/rsync_vue_game_mtddp_admin.sh
> ```

> [!TIP] 萌兔对对碰 - 测试 - API
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/demo/rsync_xcp_api.sh
> ```

> [!TIP] 萌兔对对碰 - 测试 - DCS
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/demo/rsync_xcp_dcs.sh
> ```

> [!CAUTION] 萌兔对对碰 - 正式 - SERVER
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/mtddp/rsync_go_game_admin.sh
> ```

> [!CAUTION] 萌兔对对碰 - 正式 - WEB
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/mtddp/rsync_vue_game_admin.sh
> ```

> [!CAUTION] 萌兔对对碰 - 正式 - API
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/mtddp/rsync_xcp_api.sh
> ```

> [!CAUTION] 萌兔对对碰 - 正式 - DCS
> ``` shell
> sh /opt/www/scripts/game/mtddp/rsync_xcp_dcs.sh
> ```

## 网址

| 类型 | 地址                                  |
| ---- | ------------------------------------- |
| 测试 | <http://xcp-mtddp-demo.fire2333.com>  |
| 正式 | <https://xcp-mtddp-admin.fire233.com> |


## SVN

| 类型              | 地址                                              |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| 前后端            | svn://192.168.1.148:11002/xcp_sdk/xcp-admin-mtddp |
| API（多项目通用） | svn://192.168.1.148:11002/xcp_sdk/xcp-api         |
| DCS（多项目通用） | svn://192.168.1.148:11002/xcp_sdk/xcp-dcs         |


## 数据库

| 类型 | Host          | Port | Data 库        | Log 库        | Site 库        |
| ---- | ------------- | ---- | -------------- | ------------- | -------------- |
| 测试 | 192.168.1.153 | 3306 | xcp_mtddp_data | xcp_mtddp_log | xcp_mtddp_site |
| 正式 | 192.168.2.101 | 3307 | xcp_mtddp_data | xcp_mtddp_log | xcp_mtddp_site |
